page.title: 14AMENITIES
page.content: There are few amenities in the block. Some of Little Bytham's amenities (the church, Post Office, petrol pump, shop and one of its two pubs) are only just outside our block, but people still have to travel well outside the area for much of their shopping, education, sports activities, health care and entertainment. Little Bytham's Village Hall (also just outside the block) is our bingo, disco and theatre! A mobile library visits once a fortnight. Little Bytham's small private gallery used to open regularly, but is now in less frequent use. The ground floor is a pottery and sculpture studio. Little Bytham Station, closed about 18 years ago, is now used by track maintenance teams and as warehousing. The nearest stations are Stamford (7 miles), Peterborough (20 miles), and Grantham (14 miles).
